author: sheng ah
comment: I was unhappy for the android wear updare 1.5 to 2.0 on my new asus zenwatch 3 after i bought it for 5day. Now after the update some of the features like ZenWatch manager, zenwatch remote & facedesign cannot be install to the watch. Cannot copy google account to watch, therefore play store on watch doesn't work. Eventhought google play music doesn't exit anymore on the watch. New gorgeous watch because an update felt like less features..... Pls fix this matter asap.  If not the watch not worthy for me any more. Fed up with this problem.

author: Gabriel Jiang
comment: Delete this app from zenwatch3 can boost performance. my zenwatch 3 is actually slow with frame dropping but I don't have a good way to remove the app from my watch. Hope you guys could realize the problem.

author: Fred Tarasevicius
comment: It fails to properly track sleep with interruptions. I wake up for 10 minutes and my sleep is only counted from when I go back to bed. This is a major issue and support failed to respond to my request for help.

author: John Sutton
comment: App takes way to long to show activity logs. I'm not talking seconds either more like minutes. The graphs are basic in my opinion too and could be more detailed or have more views/filters. The watch app is fine, it's the phone app that needs work.

author: Rutchawit Pornpaichayont
comment: I always use this ,everyday it will run by itself,but I noticed that wrong when I was on the bus .The steps count  detection had going on .so I need you to fix it as soon as you can.

author: Ensenador Jones
comment: Data not transferable to other apps to keep a running record of my calories burned.  I mean I have to write the numbers down and then type them into another app.  Want to look at my data over more than just one week.

author: Amirul Fikri
comment: Please let the app to have push notification....it is a pain when I need to open the app to track my step...when I close the app it just stop tracking my step...hope you guys put that in the next update

author: Thais Rodrigues
comment: It's awesome, but it'd be nice to have more work out options rather than just walking, running or cycling.

author: Johnley Angala
comment: please add zenfone 4 series in the compatible devices, i use zenfone 4 selfie ang the steps counter is almost not working and not accurate, i love this app in my zenfone 2 ze551ml

author: Aurion Woodgate
comment: Would be better if I could change energy unit to Kj rather than stuck on Kcal

author: Amit Jadhav
comment: What era are you guys living in!? Why isn't the data recorded synced with cloud? Everytime the app gets uninstalled all the data recorded till date is lost!

author: Fernando Pranata
comment: Why i dont get sleep feature? Should i use watch?

author: Autumn Ryan
comment: Haven't studied in depth yet, but I like what I've seen so far

author: sukhvinder singh
comment: Heart rate count is totally different evev in 3 consequent readings.

author: Edward Chaltron
comment: Uninstalled and my battery life improved, but it restarted itself and updated automatically.  I'd love to disable it.

author: Rishi dev
comment: Its good but should develop for senseing body temp too and should hv Bluetooth pairing and screen lock display too

author: chan yog
comment: Takes much time to count steps. Not even single widgets is available  👎

author: Arno Goyvaerts
comment: Slows down watch...

author: Mervyn Sookhai
comment: App needs a widget.
Nice app

comment: Not showing measures very disappointed

author: debasis behera
comment: Aswm app
Piss off

author: Syed Taufiq Dweep
comment: Nice

author: Lilly Tomlinson
comment: Amazing

author: Jesentia Hoelscher
comment: Well sleep tracking doesn't even exist on my phone (Asus Zoom 3) which is in itself fairly annoying. Then there's this glitch where it will just delete itself (has happened twice) and since there are zero options to backup data to something like an email I can't recover Anything. Don't even get me started on how bad the set count is... Only positive I've seen is it doesn't zap your battery, but I would gladly change my phone more in order to have a useful and reliable tracker.

author: Willy Burns
comment: Rubbish  every time I tap on the app it gives no reading so exit out and re-enter an all I get is a blank screen, probably worst fittess app out therr

author: Scutu Mix
comment: Very slow app! After a workout it takes minutes too see the results, most of the time I give up and check the results on Google Fit app!

author: Mark Worsham
comment: Never syncs data from my zenwatch 2, which makes it absolutely useless.

author: Sourav Das
comment: App crashes while opening in moto c. Nougat Android

author: Umar MuShtq
comment: It is good but needs improvement in auto step detection and sleep detection ..rest is wonderful

author: Andrei Mircea
comment: This APP requires widgets like  Samsung!

author: Sameer Tamboli
comment: Needed screen rotation support

author: Rushin Gandhi
comment: Loved it.

author: Chitrak Biswas
comment: good app for health

author: SURESH BAGORIYA
comment: Nice app

author: Robert Mastrolembo
comment: Love it.

author: Shane Borczuch
comment: I like it, but it is very buggy. Like other users I have found a discrepancy with ZenFit and Google Fit. But unlike other users I found Google fit to be the battery hog not a ZenFit. I have no way of determining which is more accurate. Twice I have seen a drastic increase in steps for no reason. There is no way I walked 44 kilometers at work in one day. I am enjoying the sleep tracking data. Had to reinstall it a few times due to the data no synching with my watch completely.

author: shawn silver
comment: I only do the steps everyday at work and use the push-up monitor at home. It works great because I don't have to count my push-ups as I go it counts it for me. It may be off 2 push-ups but a little extra work out never hurt nobody 😀
App is good but steps activity data shows wrong.....when I was walking 10 steps and app shows more than 30 steps... in app all is good but this is simple​ fault ....
